                /farmer -100 -100 0 Mateo -100 -100 0 Juliet -100 -100 0 Rosa -100 -100 0 Jessie -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd? -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren? -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar? -100 -100 0 RodneyOBrien? -100 -100 0 SenS? -100 -100 0 Krobus -100 -100 0 Nova.Eli? -100 -100 0 Nova.Dylan? -100 -100 0 Aideen -100 -100 0 Jacob -100 -100 0 Eloise -100 -100 0 ToriLK -100 -100 0 Nora? -100 -100 0 FC.Barron? -100 -100 0 FC.John? -100 -100 0 Fievel? -100 -100 0 OliverK -100 -100 0 JosephineK -100 -100 0 Beatrice -100 -100 0 Jasper -100 -100 0 VivienneLK -100 -100 0 Eyvinder -100 -100 3 KennedyLK? -100 -100 0 EnderTedi.JSE.Toil? -100 -100 1 EnderTedi.JSE.Trouble? -100 -100 1
                /changeToTemporaryMap EastScarp_Village
                /viewport -1000 -1000
                /addTemporaryActor WeddingArch 125 80 17 106 0 false Character
                /positionOffset WeddingArch 8 0
                /addTemporaryActor MateoEmeritus 32 32 16 108 1 true Character
                /addTemporaryActor MateoGunther 16 32 -100 -100 0 true Character
                /addTemporaryActor MateoMarlon 16 32 20 113 0 true Character
                /changeName MateoMarlon Marlon
                /positionOffset MateoMarlon 32 0

                /warp farmer 20 107/warp Mateo 21 107
                /faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame Mateo 37
                /positionOffset farmer 0 16

                /warp Jessie 24 110/warp ToriLK 24 111/warp Nova.Dylan? 24 112/warp Beatrice 24 113
                /warp Rosa 23 110/warp Jasper 23 111/warp Fievel? 23 112/warp RodneyOBrien? 23 113
                /warp Juliet 22 110/warp VivienneLK 22 111/warp Nova.Eli? 22 112/warp SenS? 22 113

                /warp MateoGunther 19 110/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren? 19 111/warp Eloise 19 112/warp FC.John? 19 113
                /warp Aideen 18 110/warp Krobus 18 111/warp Jacob 18 112/warp Nora? 18 113/warp KennedyLK? 18 114
                /warp JosephineK 17 110/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd? 17 111/warp FC.Barron? 17 112/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar? 17 113/warp OliverK 17 114/

                /positionOffset FC.Barron? -32 0

                /warp Eyvinder 30 102
                /warp EnderTedi.JSE.Toil? 5 106/warp EnderTedi.JSE.Trouble? 5 107
                /viewport 20 110 true
                /advancedMove MateoMarlon false 0 -5 4 1000 2 1
                /globalFadeToClear
                /proceedPosition MateoMarlon
                /emote MateoMarlon 40
                /pause 500
                /faceDirection farmer 2
                /showFrame Mateo 36
                /emote Mateo 32 true
                /pause 100
                /emote farmer 32 true
                /pause 600
                /showFrame MateoMarlon 41
                /pause 500
                /speak MateoMarlon "Thank you, everyone, for being here.$0#$b#I'm grateful for being given the opportunity to officiate the wedding of one of my best guild members, @.$1"
                /pause 500
                /emote Jessie 20 true/pause 500/emote Fievel? 32 true/emote SenS? 20 true/pause 500/emote Nora? 32 true/pause 750/emote FC.Barron? 32 true
                /showFrame MateoMarlon 43
                /pause 500
                /speak MateoMarlon "And of a dear friend, Mateo.$1"
                /emote Mateo 32 true
                /pause 500
                /speak Mateo "Thank you, Marlon.$1"
                /pause 500
                /emote MateoMarlon 20 true/pause 500/emote MateoGunther 32 true/pause 500/emote Nova.Eli? 20 true/emote MateoEmeritus 20 true/emote Aideen 32 true
                /pause 300
                /showFrame Mateo 37
                /pause 200
                /speak Mateo "Ready, Sunshine?"
                /faceDirection farmer 1
                /emote farmer 20
                /advancedMove MateoMarlon false 0 1 2 1
                /proceedPosition MateoMarlon
                /emote MateoMarlon 40
                /speak MateoMarlon "As the Guild Master of the Adventurer's Guild, it is my pleasure to pronounce Mateo and @ as partners in crime.$0#$b#You may now kiss.$1"
                /advancedMove MateoMarlon false 0 2 4 1
                /pause 200
                /positionOffset Mateo -16 0
                /showFrame farmer 101
                /showFrame Mateo 38
                /specificTemporarySprite heart 21 106
                /pause 2000
                /viewport move 0 -1 6000
                /globalFade
                /viewport -1000 -1000
                /end wedding
Entries.Hector:
sweet/-1000 -1000
                /farmer -100 -100 0 Hector -100 -100 0 Mateo -100 -100 0 Juliet -100 -100 0 Rosa -100 -100 0 Jessie -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd? -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren? -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar? -100 -100 0 RodneyOBrien? -100 -100 0 SenS? -100 -100 0 Krobus -100 -100 0 Nova.Eli? -100 -100 0 Nova.Dylan? -100 -100 0 Aideen -100 -100 0 Jacob -100 -100 0 Eloise -100 -100 0 ToriLK -100 -100 0 Nora? -100 -100 0 FC.Barron? -100 -100 0 FC.John? -100 -100 0 Fievel? -100 -100 0 OliverK -100 -100 0 JosephineK -100 -100 0 Beatrice -100 -100 0 Jasper -100 -100 0 VivienneLK -100 -100 0 KennedyLK? -100 -100 0 EnderTedi.JSE.Toil? -100 -100 2 EnderTedi.JSE.Trouble? -100 -100 2
                /changeToTemporaryMap EastScarp_Village
                /viewport -1000 -1000
                /addTemporaryActor WeddingArch 125 80 17 106 0 false Character
                /positionOffset WeddingArch 8 0
                /addTemporaryActor MateoEmeritus 32 32 16 108 1 true Character
                /addTemporaryActor BookDryad 1 1 21 105 2 true Character
                /positionOffset BookDryad 24 0
                /hideShadow BookDryad true

                /warp farmer 21 107/warp Hector 20 107
                /faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Hector 1 true
                /positionOffset farmer 0 16

                /warp Jessie 24 110/warp ToriLK 24 111/warp Nova.Dylan? 24 112/warp Beatrice 24 113
                /warp Rosa 23 110/warp Jasper 23 111/warp Fievel? 23 112/warp RodneyOBrien? 23 113
                /warp Juliet 22 110/warp VivienneLK 22 111/warp Nova.Eli? 22 112/warp SenS? 22 113

                /warp Mateo 19 110/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren? 19 111/warp FC.John? 19 112/warp KennedyLK? 19 113
                /warp Aideen 18 110/warp Krobus 18 111/warp Jacob 18 112/warp OliverK 18 113
                /warp JosephineK 17 110/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd? 17 111/warp FC.Barron? 17 112/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar? 17 113/warp Nora? 17 114/

                /warp Eloise 24 108
                /faceDirection Eloise 3 true
                /positionOffset Eloise -32 0

                /positionOffset FC.Barron? -32 0

                /warp EnderTedi.JSE.Toil? 26 103/warp EnderTedi.JSE.Trouble? 25 103

                /faceDirection Rosa 3 true/faceDirection Juliet 1 true
                /faceDirection Nova.Eli? 1 true/faceDirection Nova.Dylan? 3 true
                /faceDirection FC.John? 3 true/faceDirection Jacob 1 true
                /changePortrait Hector HoodDown
                /changeSprite Hector HoodDown
                /viewport 20 110 true
                /emote Juliet 40 true
                /globalFadeToClear
                /pause 200
                /emote Jacob 40 true
                /emote Nova.Eli? 40 true
                /pause 500
                /emote Eloise 32 true
                /pause 500
                /emote FC.John? 40 true
                /emote Nova.Eli? 40
                /textAboveHead Nova.Dylan? "Eli, lower your volume!"
                /emote Aideen 40 true
                /pause 1000
                /speak Juliet "Rosa, you got any clue who that is?$2"
                /emote Rosa 40 true
                /pause 500
                /speak Rosa "Not a clue, I've never seen him (note: replace with hector pronoun token when i18n'ing) before...$3#$b#Apprently an East Scarp resident?$3"
                /emote Nova.Eli? 40 true
                /pause 500
                /speak Juliet "Weird that we've never seen him (note: replace with hector pronoun token when i18n'ing) before.$1#$b#Wonder if anyone else knows him (note: replace with hector pronoun token when i18n'ing)?$0"
                /faceDirection Eloise 2
                /emote Eloise 8
                /advancedMove Eloise false -1 0 0 1 2 1
                /proceedPosition Eloise
                /pause 500
                /faceDirection Juliet 0/faceDirection Rosa 0
                /speak Eloise "That's Hector, he (note: replace with hector pronoun token when i18n'ing) works at the vet clinic with my dad!$1#$b#He's (note: replace with hector pronoun token when i18n'ing) a great kind wolf!$0"
                /textAboveHead Rosa "Wolf?"
                /pause 1000
                /speak Eloise "Yup!$1"
                /textAboveHead Juliet "Let the kid imagine."
                /advancedMove Eloise false 0 -1 -2 0 4 1
                /proceedPosition Eloise
                /faceDirection Hector 2/faceDirection farmer 2 true
                /speak Hector "Hey there, Eloise, you ready for this wedding?$6"
                /emote farmer 20 true
                /speak Eloise "Yup! Should we start?$1"
                /speak Hector "Me and my Deer-ly Beloved are ready for this, take it away!$6"
                /faceDirection Eloise 2
                /proceedPosition Eloise
                /textAboveHead Eloise "*Cough* *Cough*"
                /pause 1000
                /speak Eloise "Everyone! Attention over here!"
                /emote Nova.Eli? 8 true
                /faceDirection Nova.Eli? 0/faceDirection Nova.Dylan? 0/faceDirection FC.John? 0/emote Aideen 8 true/faceDirection Jacob 0/emote Jasper 8
                /pause 1000
                /speak Eloise "We're all gathered here today to celebrate the wedding of Hector and @!#$b#Let's begin!$1"
                /faceDirection Eloise 0
                /pause 500
                /speak Eloise "Hector, do you take @ as your wedded ${husband^wife^spouse}$?$1"
                /emote Hector 20
                /textAboveHead Hector "I do."
                /pause 500
                /textAboveHead Jacob "Look at my Eloise..."
                /pause 500
                /speak Eloise "@, do you take Hector as your wedded (oh god we probably need a new token to decide between wife and husband based on hector's gender)?$1"
                /emote farmer 20
                /textAboveHead BookDryad "I do."
                /pause 1000
                /speak Eloise "Then as your best friend, it is my pleasure to unite @ and Hector in the bonds of marrage.$0#$b#$1I now pronounce you partners!$1"
                /advancedMove Eloise false 0 3 4 1
                /pause 500
                /speak Hector "Is this the part were we kiss?$9"
                /textAboveHead BookDryad "Yes!"
                /pause 1000
                /speak Hector "Then lets do that.$8"
                /pause 500
                /positionOffset Hector 16 0
                /faceDirection farmer 3 true
                /showFrame farmer 101 true
                /showFrame Hector 28
                /specificTemporarySprite heart 21 106
                /pause 2000
                /viewport move 0 -1 6000
                /globalFade
                /viewport -1000 -1000
                /end wedding
